channel.title: Counter to current meta(Not Quite)
channel.description:
> ## [color=Stepblue]The Governor[/color] :shield: > **[color=Stepblue]Unique Blue Dragon Social[/color]** **Personal Assistant (Passive)** - See all King's actions during a night. **Accurate Listing (Night)** - See all whispers to and from the King - Infinite uses **Commissionaire (Night)** - Send anonymously a letter to player. - Infinite uses _Defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._
> ## [color=purple]The Chancellor[/color] :shield: > **[color=purple]Unique Unseen Social[/color]** **Personal Assistant (Passive)** - See all King's actions during a night. **Searching for Truth (Day)** - Announce the King's Faction to all Unseen - 1 uses (Not usable until Day 4) **Accurate Listing (Night)** - See all whispers to and from the King - Infinite uses **Perfect Forging (Night)** - Choose a player. Tonight, you will be able to look at and edit their logs. If that player dies tonight, your version will show up as their logs in the graveyard. - 2 uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
Talking about wild discussion about the "Whisper King" Meta, adding a new class who is relying to whispers and overall King's action this would be one of solutions (Other is obviously buff Noble to counter this strategy but you know this).

item.title: Counter to current meta(Not Quite)
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
Simon:

I’d make commissionaire limited/1 use, since that makes it less easily confirmable and makes it so the chancellor can claim it’s unconverted counterpart.

Actually, it probably doesn’t matter in most scenarios, but yea i can see a point.

Simon:

I’d also suggest making chancellor’s accurate listening give into to the entire unseen to coordinate claiming easier, but im less sure of that

There is no need for that, the only situation when this will make any difference is when the Chancellor will be in jail next night.

Read full topic

I’d make commissionaire limited/1 use, since that makes it less easily confirmable and makes it so the chancellor can claim it’s unconverted counterpart.

item.title: Counter to current meta(Not Quite)
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
So, the problem may lies in a 60/20/20 thing than in actually whispering. Otherwise this class could counter any tries to “allying” with suspicious claims.

Read full topic

item.title: Counter to current meta(Not Quite)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I don’t think this will actually work. He’s BD most of the time so king is still safe to whisper.

Read full topic

item.title: Counter to current meta(Not Quite)
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
The Governor

Unique Blue Dragon Social
Personal Assistant (Passive) - See all King’s actions during a night.
Accurate Listing (Night) - See all whispers to and from the King - Infinite uses
Commissionaire (Night) - Send anonymously a letter to player. - Infinite uses
Defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

The Chancellor

Unique Unseen Social
Personal Assistant (Passive) - See all King’s actions during a night.
Searching for Truth (Day) - Announce the King’s Faction to all Unseen - 1 uses (Not usable until Day 4)
Accurate Listing (Night) - See all whispers to and from the King - Infinite uses
Perfect Forging (Night) - Choose a player. Tonight, you will be able to look at and edit their logs. If that player dies tonight, your version will show up as their logs in the graveyard. - 2 uses
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Talking about wild discussion about the “Whisper King” Meta, adding a new class who is relying to whispers and overall King’s action this would be one of solutions (Other is obviously buff Noble to counter this strategy but you know this).

Read full topic
